author: Jornal i
title: Reféns resgatados sem vida em Gaza foram baleados
text:
Reféns resgatados sem vida em Gaza foram baleados Jornal i © AFP 22/08/2024 22:04
Share on Facebook Share on Twitter
Share on LinkedIn
Share on WhatsApp
Email this Page As autoridades israelitas sublinharam que os resultados das autópsias são ainda preliminares
Os resultados preliminares da autópsia efetuada pelo Instituto Forense Abu Kabir aos corpos dos seis reféns resgatados sem vida esta semana da Faixa de Gaza revelaram que estes apresentavam ferimentos de bala.
As Forças de Defesa de Israel transmitiram esta quinta-feira os resultados das autópsias às famílias de Alex Dancyg, Yagev Buchstav, Chaim Peri, Yoram Metzger, Nadav Popplewell e Avraham Munder, os últimos seis reféns resgatados sem vida pelo exército israelita.
As autoridades israelitas sublinharam que os resultados das autópsias são ainda preliminares e que nem as Forças Armadas, nem as autoridades de saúde, se atrevem ainda a aventar quais terão sido as causas exatas das mortes.
O Instituto Forense Abu Kabir está também envolvido no processo de identificação de outros quatro cadáveres, encontrados junto aos dos reféns, dentro da Faixa de Gaza, mas que não apresentam sinais de terem sido baleados.
O Exército israelita indicou que poderão ser membros do movimento terrorista palestiniano Hamas mortos nos ataques israelitas.
O Fórum das Famílias dos Reféns, o principal grupo em se organizaram os familiares das pessoas sequestradas pelo Hamas, apontou este relatório preliminar forense como “mais uma prova da crueldade dos terroristas que mantêm em cativeiro 109 reféns há 321 dias”.
A organização apelou ao governo liderado por Benjamin Netanyahu para concentrar os seus esforços na obtenção de um acordo que permita a libertação e o regresso a casa dos mais de 100 reféns ainda detidos pelo Hamas na Faixa de Gaza.
A 7 de outubro do ano passado Israel começou uma guerra na Faixa de Gaza para “erradicar” o Hamas, horas depois do movimento terrorista ter realizado em território israelita um ataque de proporções sem precedentes, matando 1.194 pessoas, na maioria civis, e fazendo também nesse dia 251 reféns. 109 permanecem em cativeiro e 41 morreram entretanto.

author: Kristine Fellizar
title: Tory Burch Is Having One of Its Biggest Sales of the Year With Massive Discounts on Their Iconic Bags, Boots & Miller Cloud Sandals
text:
If you purchase an independently reviewed product or service through a link on our website, SheKnows may receive an affiliate commission.
As the year comes to an end, we can always count on there being countless year-end sales to get us extra excited to start a new year. Whether you’re looking to score some
affordable designer finds or cookware worthy of the likes of Gordon Ramsey and Oprah, you’re sure to find a sale that’ll help you start 2024 off right. If you’re like us and can’t get enough of Tory Burch’s classic and sophisticated styles, you won’t want to miss one of the brand’s biggest sales of the year, which is happening right now.
The
Tory Burch Semi-Annual Sale is back and better than ever before. There are hundreds of pieces of on sale ranging from shopper-loved shoes to their ultra-chic purses. Unlike other sales throughout the year, their Semi-Annual Sale offers discounts on top of discounts. So everything included in their sale section is an extra 25% off. With that additional savings, you can score deals over 50% off. It doesn’t get any better than that.
Naturally, with an additional discount that good, popular styles are already starting to sell out. After all, discounted high-end fashion waits for no one. So, what’s worth shopping now? Take a look below at a
few stylish options that are massively discounted. We guarantee that you’ll want to treat yourself to almost everything!
Our mission at SheKnows is to empower and inspire women, and we only feature products we think you’ll love as much as we do. Please note that if you purchase something by clicking on a link within this story, we may receive a small commission of the sale.
Limited-Edition Crossbody
We’ve had our eye on this super cute find since it dropped ahead of Black Friday. Not only is it a super chic
crossbody bag that you can wear with pretty much anything, it’s limited edition and exclusive to ToryBurch.com. You have six colors to choose from and it’s on sale for nearly 50% off.
Ella Printed Tote Bag
We’re absolutely loving the print on this
Ella Printed Tote Bag, and the tote itself is not bad too! In fact, it’s lightweight, super roomy, and even comes with an interior laptop pocket. You can use it for work or travel. It’s also a great bag if you’re someone who typically likes carrying around everything everywhere.
Minnie Travel Ballet
No other ballet flat is as iconic as
Tory Burch’s Minnie Travel Ballet. They’re super comfortable to wear and go perfectly with jeans, skirts, dresses — you name it. During the brand’s semi-annual sale, you can snag a pair for over 50% off. We recommend acting fast as this popular shoe is selling fast.
Miller Cloud Sandal
Speaking of iconic footwear, it may be winter but there’s no better time to snag a pair of the best-selling
Miller Cloud Sandal. As one reviewer wrote, “These sandals are beautiful and stylish. The fit is excellent and they are super comfortable. The merlot color is divine too.” You can snag these gorgeous merlot sandals with a unique metallic-like finish for nearly 40% off.
Double T Chelsea Boot
Can’t resist a pair of cute Chelsea boots? Neither can we! With Tory Burch’s signature Double T logo elevating these
Chelsea boots, you’re guaranteed to get a ton of compliments. While these boots retail for over $400, you can score them today for just over $180.
Before you go, check out this slideshow below

author: R. Bruna
title: Hamàs exigeix que l’intercanvi de presoners inclogui líders palestins | R. Bruna | Barcelona | Política | El Punt Avui
text: Guerra a Gaza Hamàs exigeix que l’intercanvi de presoners inclogui líders palestins Qatar assegura que el moviment islamista ha donat senyals d’acceptar la proposta d’alliberament d’ostatges a canvi d’una treva a la Franja Hamàs ha donat mostres d’acceptar d’entrada l’esborrany de proposta per alliberar ostatges a canvi d’una nova treva a la Franja de Gaza, segons Qatar, que actua com a mediador. El moviment islamista, però, vol que l’intercanvi de presoners inclogui líders palestins, tat de Hamàs com d’altres faccions, encarcerats a Israel. El grup palestí exigeix l’alliberament de Marwan Barghouti, un destacat dirigent de Fatah empresonat per haver realitzat atacs contra israelians; l’exsecretari general del Front Popular per a l’Alliberament de Palestina Ahmed Saddat, acusat de planejar l’assassinat del ministre de Turisme israelià Rehevam Zeevi el 2001. Hamàs també reclama l’excarceració d’alts càrrecs del seu moviment i de la branca militar, com Abdal·là al Barghouti, Hasan Salama, Abas al Sayed o Ibrahim Hamed. Segons fonts coneixedores de la negociació citades per l’agència Efe, la delegació de Hamàs que ha viatjat a Egipte per discutir un possible acord, encapçalada pel líder polític de l’organització, Ismail Haniyeh, ha traslladat aquesta al cap de la intel·ligència egipicia, Abas Kamel, que aquesta és un dels requisits per donar el vistiplau a la proposta. Les mateixes fonts han apuntat que la “insistència” de Hamàs en la posada en llibertat dels líders palestins és un senyal que el grup islamista “ja pensa en l’endemà de la guerra, les seves relacions amb el moviment Fatah i altres faccions palestines”. La proposa que està sobre la taula contempla un alto el foc de 45 dies i un intercanvi de captius en mans de Hamàs a Gaza per palestins que estan tancats presons israelianes. El bescanvi es faria en diverses fases i en la primera serien alliberats 35 civils en mans de Hamàs. Per cada ostatge israelià, cent presoners palestins serien excarcerats. L’esborrany també contempla un increment de l’entrada d’ajuda humanitària a la Franja de Gaza El portaveu del ministeri d’Afers Exteriors de Qatar, Makhed al Ansari, s’ha mostrat “optimista” respecte d’un possible acord perquè aquesta és la primera vegada que “totes dues parts estan d’acord amb les premisses” sobre les quals es negocia. “La reunió a París ha aconseguit consolidar una proposta sobre la taula que ha estat aprovada per la part israeliana i ara tenim una confirmació positiva inicial de Hamàs”, ha afirmat durant una xerrada a la Universitat John Hopkins de Washington. Al Ansari ha reconegut que queda “un camí molt difícil per davant”, però confia que en les pròximes setmanes hi pot haver “bones notícies”. author: Devdiscourse News Desk
title: MotoGP Valencia Grand Prix Canceled Amid Devastating Floods | Sports-Games
text: MotoGP Valencia Grand Prix Canceled Amid Devastating Floods The MotoGP Valencia Grand Prix has been canceled due to severe floods in eastern Spain. The decision aims to prioritize recovery efforts. An alternative venue and date will be announced, while championship rivals Jorge Martin and Francesco Bagnaia are set to compete elsewhere. The MotoGP organization announced the cancellation of the Valencia Grand Prix on Friday amid devastating floods in the region. The catastrophe, which claimed 205 lives, prompted the decision to redirect resources to recovery efforts rather than proceed with the race. In a statement, MotoGP expressed its commitment to supporting relief funds in the affected areas rather than racing at the Ricardo Tormo circuit. The move reflects the priorities of local authorities and the championship in response to Europe's deadliest weather event in five decades. Riders including Jorge Martin and Francesco Bagnaia emphasized the ethical decision to cancel, with the championship now waiting to announce a new venue for the crucial closing race. The decision aims to ensure that all efforts benefit the devastated communities. (With inputs from agencies.)
